resource: 1002118.derived=false 1002118.description=The Toyota Prius received the lowest number of problems per 100 vehicles among compact cars in the proprietary J.D. Power and Associates 2011 Vehicle Dependability StudySM. Study based on 43,779 consumer responses measuring problems consumers experienced in the past 12 months with three-year-old vehicles (2008 model year cars and trucks). Proprietary study results are based on experiences and perceptions of consumers surveyed October-December 2010. Your experiences may vary. Visit jdpower.com 1002118.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002118.vtc=true
